subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Plácido Polanco hit a broken-bat, tie-breaking single with two outs in the ninth against Jonathan Papelbon to lift the host Detroit Tigers to a 10-9 victory against the Boston Red Sox on Wednesday night.
snippet: Plácido Polanco hit a broken-bat, tie-breaking single with two outs in the ninth against Jonathan Papelbon to lift the host Detroit Tigers to a 10-9 victory against the Boston Red Sox on Wednesday night.
